projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- My Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: DECEPTICONS - (virtual classroom)
projects.bodyText: - The DECEPTICONS project is a virtual classroom platform designed to facilitate interactive learning for educational institutions . It allows users to add preferred teachers and provides a space for personalized teaching and knowledgesharing.
